Bridging Gaps with Solid Slabs

From commercial to residential, Bancru's concrete solutions are built to last

Get a quote

What we do

Bancru Concrete crafts with excellence, building everything from robust commercial footings to elegant residential walkways. Our team brings expertise in creating durable post-tension slabs and artful finishes like stamping and staining to every project.

How We Do It

We blend strength with style, using advanced techniques for construction that lasts. With specialized equipment, including mini excavators and skid steers, we prep, clear, and grade sites to prime perfection.

Our Promise

Delivering more than concrete solutions, we ensure each build is a benchmark for quality and care. Bancru is about building foundations that last a lifetime, with services designed for your project's enduring success.

Commercial

Building business from the ground up with concrete solutions that promise progress and durability.

Foundations and Slabs

  • Large-scale building foundations
  • Concrete slabs for warehouses, retail spaces, and industrial facilities
  • Tilt-up construction

Parking Lots and Structures

  • Concrete parking lot paving
  • Multi-level parking structures
  • Loading dock installations

Roadways and Sidewalks

  • Concrete road construction
  • Durable and ADA-compliant sidewalks
  • Curbs and gutters

Structural Concrete

  • Columns, beams, and retaining walls
  • Bridge components and infrastructure

Decorative and Stamped Concrete

  • Decorative finishes for commercial patios, plazas, and walkways
  • Stamped concrete for outdoor spaces

Erosion Control and Grading

  • Site preparation and grading for large projects
  • Retaining walls for erosion prevention

Repair and Maintenance

  • Crack and joint sealing
  • Resurfacing and grinding
  • Concrete demolition and removal

Residential

Crafting comfortable living spaces with bespoke concrete designs that blend form, function, and family.

Driveways and Sidwalks

  • New driveway installations

Patios and Outdoor Living Areas

  • Concrete patios with custom designs

Garage and Basement Floors

  • Smooth and durable garage floors
  • Polished or stained basement floors

Pool Decks and Outdoor Features

  • Slip-resistant and decorative pool decks
  • Custom outdoor features like fire pits and seating areas

Foundations and Slabs

  • Foundations for home additions and garages
  • Concrete slabs for sheds, workshops, or other structures
